document.full_text: the jurors heard tapes of conversations that raj rajaratnam, the galleon group's chief, had with danielle chiesi, who has pleaded guilty to trading confidential information with him.
document.title: galleon jurors focus on taped calls
lines_and_colors: the jurors heard tapes of conversations that raj rajaratnam, the galleon group's chief, had with danielle chiesi, who has pleaded guilty to trading confidential information with him.
